Description: Structured method for gathering and representing information from fieldwork
Contextual inquiry: An approach to ethnographic study where the user is an expert and the designer is an apprentice
Contextual interview: An interview with somebody to gain insight into how they may use a system
Work Flow Model: How work is broken up across people and how it is coordinated to get the whole job done
Affinity Diagram: A tool that gathers large amounts of data (ideas, opinions, issues) and organizes them into groupings based on their natural relationships
